home.title: Draw Around
home.attribution: Freely inspired by the board game Telestrations

rules.0: Make sure you have a stable Internet connection and enough battery left on your device.
rules.1: You should be at least 4 people to play. One of you is named Game Master and creates the game. The Game Master sends the link to the game to the other players.
rules.2: Pick a word or sentence that the next person will have to sketch.
rules.3: Draw the word or sentence, or try to guess what the previous person drew. Then, your drawing or idea is passed on to the next player, and so on.
rules.4: When everybody has drawn all of the words, we look at the drawing pads! Look at what the initial words or sentences became and vote for your favorite sketches and ideas.
